## Access AWS at Urban 

::: {style="font-size: 90%"}
::: {.fragment fragment-index=1}
* **To access the cloud right now:** 
  * Run R, Python, or Stata code via [Tech Tools](https://tech-tools.urban.org/ec2-submission/). 
  * Fill out the [S3 intake form](https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form/09c4375b223549deb2ee74d510c98297) to request cloud storage. 
:::

::: {.fragment fragment-index=2}
* **For ad hoc questions:** 
  * Join our Slack channel (#aws) or email us (AWSAdmin@urban.org). 
:::

::: {.fragment fragment-index=3}
* **To integrate the cloud into a proposal or project:** 
  * Use the [TECH intake form](https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form?EQBCT=5b8bcb21f39c4f19b96c448e4a6622a0).
